definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: deliverance (si vera l., prop. Inf. of foregoing);—´[[רָנֵּי פ]] Ps 32:7 shouts of deliverance (dub., v. Comm.); [[עַל־אָוֶן פַּלֶּט־לָָמוֹ]] Ps 56:8, read [[פַּלֶּס־]] (Ew Hup al.) for (their) iniquity weigh  to them (retribution), or [[עַל־אָוֶן אֵין פַּלֶּט־]] Bae.
